name: HBT
description:
This game is in deep alpha and contains a set of levels for about 3-4 hours of gameplay.

You have to solve puzzles of building construction in a confined space and defeat the enemy in an unequal battle.

This page on itch.io was created to get feedback from players and to understand the direction of the game. I will be grateful for the found errors, suggestions and wishes and will try to fulfill most of them that do not contradict the concept.

Now I draw the interface according to the principle “as I can”, therefore I apologize in advance for the aesthetic gag reflexes.
